conclusion: To find the charge Q carried by the capacitor after the circuit stabilizes.
Determine the equivalent resistance of the circuit.
Calculate the equivalent resistance R_{23} of R_2 and R_3 in parallel: R_{23} = 2 Ω.
Calculate the total resistance R_total in the circuit: R_total = 4 Ω.
Calculate the total current I supplied by the battery: I = 1 A.
Determine the voltage across the capacitor V_C, which is the same as the voltage across R_{23}: V_{R_{23}} = 2 V.
Calculate the charge Q on the capacitor: Q = 20 μC.
The charge Q carried by the capacitor is 20 μC.
